lessonTitle: Bulk Math Practice: Geometry and Arithmetic

stages.headline: The circle above with center O has a circumference of 36. What is the length of minor arc AC?

The figure shows the lengths, in centimeters (cm), of the edges of a right rectangular prism. The volume V of a right rectangular prism is lwh, where l is the length, w is the width, and h is the height. What is the volume, in cubic centimeters, of the prism?
The lengths of two sides of a triangle are 4 centimeters and 6 centimeters. If the perimeter of the triangle is 18 centimeters, what is the length, in centimeters, of the third side of this triangle?
What is the area, in square inches, of a rectangle with a length of 7 inches and a width of 6 inches?
